summary: ive seen nomu deku aus a ton but,,,, nomu shouto au,,,,,,,,,, more info under cut ok so this is like, years after theyre out of...
caption:
ive seen nomu deku aus a ton but,,,, nomu shouto au,,,,,,,,,, more info under cut

ok so this is like, years after theyre out of high school. shouto n izuku have been dating since hs n are they power couple. they keep it on the down low bc of hero work but its kinda obvious so theyres already a lot of theories abt them dating. anyways basically shouto is thinking about proposing to izuku and before he does that he wants to get everything out of the way before starting a new life, i.e. finally officially distancing himself from his father and confronting him abt not taking on the todoroki name when he gets married. meets him in a secluded place mainly bc reporters follow them around a ton. shouto tells endeavor first abt not taking the todoroki name n endeavor basically weasels out fo him that he’s gonna propose to izuku. endeavor is furious and ends up surprising shouto by grabbing him by the neck(it is nastily burnt w a hand mark later)e. is yelling at him abt how he’s a fool being rebellious this far, being a disgusting gay, etc. shouto gets some hits on him but endeavor has the higher ground before finally dropping him to the ground. tells shouto he should rethink everything n leaves him there, thinking that he can get home on his own later. welp that doesnt happen as shouto passes out and is defenseless and whoops portal guy comes by and is like ooo pro hero easily for the taking nice n takes shouto away. 

after all this shouto is made missing and endeavor is a suspect since he was the last one to see shouto even if he doesnt voice it theres cameras of them meeting before they go somewhere w/o cameras. izuku is obvs hysterical trying to find shouto. finds out eventually from momo that shouto was gonna propose to him n he finds the ring in a hiding place in their apartment. izuku works himself to the bone trying to find shouto. 

abt 7-8 months later they end up finding him bc of dabi getting him out and then calling in a tip. like dabi may be a villain n doesnt like his family but hes not gonna let his baby brother get experimented on for the rest of his life and suffer like this. izuku is the first on the scene n he refuses to let go of shouto until the paramedics get there. is next to his hospital bed waiting for him to wake up

they kinda added different quirks to him, basically wanted to make it so he could use his hot n cold quirk even farther than he could before. he prob has like a mind control thing in the back of his mind for angst later. he has a quirk where he can see infrared like snakes do, has rougher skin on his left side so he can go to higher temperatures w/o harming himself. it makes his skin rough and slightly red and itll molt sometimes bc its reptilian. his eyes also kinda look like a snake and his iris’ are white bc of the infrared quirk. his body temp is lower than normal so his body can withstand more cold as well, freaks the doctors out when he has like a 72 temp

basically this is all i have so far is sad gays n shouto trying to figure out how to live w these new quirks he has. 

idk which color scheme i like more for his hair so i tired both lmao

Bakugou sighed and rolled over in bed, debating on if he should just give up on sleeping altogether or bash his head against the nearest wall to try and banish the thoughts of his roommate. Maybe it would knock him out cold.

summary: Speaking of todorokis what are ur opinions on endeavor? And what do you think will happen with this redemption arc? Tbh i kinda...
body:
Speaking of todorokis what are ur opinions on endeavor? And what do you think will happen with this redemption arc?

Tbh i kinda want to see dabi fight endeavor again with him knowing its his son this time.

Sorry for the submition, tumblr is being a stupid site and wont let me send asks to anyone 😅😅

Sorry! I have been on Tumblr mobile these past few weeks and completely missed a bunch of messages, I’m trying to catch up now!

I don’t have any strong opinion on Endeavor honestly? I no longer hate him but I don’t especially like him either. He is just there. To be completely honest I have never been super invested in the Todorokis in general. I completely agree that their storyline is very important and helped a lot of people, it just never hooked me personally. 

I will still say that I’m personally very on board with Endeavor’s recent development! I think that people trying to better themselves and fix their mistakes is ALWAYS a good thing and actually good writing. I’m still reluctant to call it “redemption” and I think I understand why some people are still not satisfied, but personally, the simple fact that he will never hurt his children again and that Shouto now lives in a safe environment satisfies me. His family doesn’t have to forgive him. That’s fine. I know for a fact that many people are or have been in similar situations with their abuser trying to change, and I think it’s a situation that’s worth being represented. And if I’m perfectly honest, I enjoy “Lame Dad Endeavor” a lot and I would be fine with Horikoshi pushing his character toward this direction … I also really enjoy Hawksdeavor! It’s a great ship!

Now when it comes to Endeavor and Dabi … I don’t really have any strong opinion either? I said it many times, but I don’t really care about Dabi being a Todoroki. Don’t get me wrong, I absolutely know that it’s real but I don’t think it’s an interesting story. Since the begining of the story, Touya was mentioned only ONCE by Natsuo and no one else really seemed to care so I don’t see why I should care either. I would be much more interested in knowing who Dabi is NOW with the LOV than who he used to be. So yeah, even if I know that a Dabi/Endeavor/Shouto fight in inevitable I don’t theorise or think much about it. From the top of my head, I think Dabi is going to be killed during a fight with Endeavor and Shouto teaming up against him. They wouldn’t actually kill him, but Dabi would accidentally kill himself by pushing his fire to the limit and eventually burning himself alive and turning to ashes. I feel like it would be a pretty satisfying ending. (That or he and Tomura get married rule the world as Kings of Evil, you choose!)

I know for a fact that many people are or have been in similar situations with their abuser trying to change, and I think it’s a situation that’s worth being represented. And if I’m perfectly honest, I enjoy “Lame Dad Endeavor” a lot and I would be fine with Horikoshi pushing his character toward this direction … I also really enjoy Hawksdeavor! It’s a great ship!

Now when it comes to Endeavor and Dabi … I don’t really have any strong opinion either? I said it many times, but I don’t really care about Dabi being a Todoroki. Don’t get me wrong, I absolutely know that it’s real but I don’t think it’s an interesting story. Since the begining of the story, Touya was mentioned only ONCE by Natsuo and no one else really seemed to care so I don’t see why I should care either. I would be much more interested in knowing who Dabi is NOW with the LOV than who he used to be. So yeah, even if I know that a Dabi/Endeavor/Shouto fight in inevitable I don’t theorise or think much about it. From the top of my head, I think Dabi is going to be killed during a fight with Endeavor and Shouto teaming up against him. They wouldn’t actually kill him, but Dabi would accidentally kill himself by pushing his fire to the limit and eventually burning himself alive and turning to ashes. I feel like it would be a pretty satisfying ending. (That or he and Tomura get married rule the world as Kings of Evil, you choose!)

trail.content_raw:
Speaking of todorokis what are ur opinions on endeavor? And what do you think will happen with this redemption arc?

Tbh i kinda want to see dabi fight endeavor again with him knowing its his son this time.

Sorry for the submition, tumblr is being a stupid site and wont let me send asks to anyone 😅😅

Sorry! I have been on Tumblr mobile these past few weeks and completely missed a bunch of messages, I’m trying to catch up now!

I don’t have any strong opinion on Endeavor honestly? I no longer hate him but I don’t especially like him either. He is just there. To be completely honest I have never been super invested in the Todorokis in general. I completely agree that their storyline is very important and helped a lot of people, it just never hooked me personally. 

I will still say that I’m personally very on board with Endeavor’s recent development! I think that people trying to better themselves and fix their mistakes is ALWAYS a good thing and actually good writing. I’m still reluctant to call it “redemption” and I think I understand why some people are still not satisfied, but personally, the simple fact that he will never hurt his children again and that Shouto now lives in a safe environment satisfies me. His family doesn’t have to forgive him. That’s fine. I know for a fact that many people are or have been in similar situations with their abuser trying to change, and I think it’s a situation that’s worth being represented. And if I’m perfectly honest, I enjoy “Lame Dad Endeavor” a lot and I would be fine with Horikoshi pushing his character toward this direction … I also really enjoy Hawksdeavor! It’s a great ship!

Don’t get me wrong, I absolutely know that it’s real but I don’t think it’s an interesting story. Since the begining of the story, Touya was mentioned only ONCE by Natsuo and no one else really seemed to care so I don’t see why I should care either. I would be much more interested in knowing who Dabi is NOW with the LOV than who he used to be. So yeah, even if I know that a Dabi/Endeavor/Shouto fight in inevitable I don’t theorise or think much about it. From the top of my head, I think Dabi is going to be killed during a fight with Endeavor and Shouto teaming up against him. They wouldn’t actually kill him, but Dabi would accidentally kill himself by pushing his fire to the limit and eventually burning himself alive and turning to ashes. I feel like it would be a pretty satisfying ending. (That or he and Tomura get married rule the world as Kings of Evil, you choose!)

summary: Requests are OPEN
title: Requests are OPEN
body:
Hi there! I have decided to re-open the requests box for a limited time only. Feel free to drop some in my inbox. 

Note that I am free to decline your request if it does not inspire me to write it, or is for a character I am not comfortable writing for.

Katsuki Bakugou / Izuku Midoriya fanfics on Ao3
Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.
This page is still under construction

summary: We'll Dance In Flames
title: We'll Dance In Flames
description:
by Oreosmack

After Izuku Midoriya’s colony is taken he promises to find a way to save them himself. His task leads him to Moonpeak, a mountain supposedly ruled by Predators. There he finds the help he needs in the form of an aggressive wolf named Bakugou Katsuki; but the rabbit finds much more in his newfound companion than he bargained for.

Words: 12227, Chapters: 4/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
